mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.publisher, b.comments, b.book_url, b.img_url, b.sub_category_id, bc.category_name FROM book b LEFT JOIN book_category bc ON b.sub_category_id = bc.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT c.id, c.book_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.comment_time, c.star, c.status, c.ups, b.title, u.username FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN book b ON c.book_id = b.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
